entry.string: The base module provides you with configuration and informational options in the Administration menu, as well as additional functionality through use of its templates and blocks.
The Administration menu is key to controlling global functionality on your site and includes:
Extension Releases: View recently releasedextensions from the xaraya.com Extension and Release RSS feed.
Cookie settings, and other defaults such as WYWIWYG editor

The Base Module provides a number of custom tags that can be used by theme creators and module developers to incorporate javascript into templates. These include the <xar:base-render-javascript ... />, <xar:base-include-javascript ... /> and <xar:base-trigger-javascript ... /> tags. See the documentation for more information.

Xaraya is currently in Beta Production. If you notice any unexpected functionality, please use our bug tracker at http://bugs.xaraya.com. Thank you for your support, and feel free to join our development or user discussions to become involved in our community.
entry.translation: Xaraya ist aktuell im Beta-Entwicklungsstadium. Wenn Sie eine unerwartete Funktionalität bemerken, melden Sie diese bitte bei unserem Bugtracker auf http://bugs.xaraya.com. Wir danken Ihnen für Ihre Unterstützung. Beteiligen Sie sich auch an der Entwickler- bzw. Nutzerdiskussion und werden so Teil unserer Gemeinschaft.
